waidya em.ayi.ji.jayathilaka mahathmiya pashu waidya niladhari - gramiya aarthikaya pilibanda amathyanshaya shri lanka saththwa nishpadana ha saukhya sewaye pashu waidya niladhariniyaka wana em.ayi.ji.jayathilaka miya 2001 warshaye di peradeniya wishwawidyalayen pashuwaidyawedi upadhiya da, kalaniya wishwawidyalayen aahara ha poshanaya pilibanda pashchath upadhiya da, shri lanka sanwardhana ha paripalana aayathanayen rajya kalamanakaranaya pilibanda pashchath upadhiya da laba gena atha. 2006 warshaye di saththwa nishpadana ha saukhya sewayata athulath wu jayathilaka mahathmiya danata mema amathyanshaye pashu sampath sanwardhana anshaye pashu waidya niladhariniyaka lesa sewaya karayi. di.ech. wikramarachchi mahatha dulkith wikramarachchi mahatha shri lanka nithi widyalayen nithignya wruththiyata piwisi athara danata brithanyaye dakunu wels wishwa widyalayen anthar jathika welendama pilibanda pashchath nithi upadhiya hadaramin siti.
